Overnight, Russia carried out another Geran-2 drone attack on eastern Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
At least 4 drones impacted the village of Novomykolaivka, 3+ drones impacted the village of Dmytrivka, 2+ drones impacted the town of Vasylkivka, 2+ drones impacted Petrivka, 1+ drone impacted the village of Artemivka, and 1+ drone impacted the vicinity of Dobropillya.
All attached videos are from Vasylkivka.

At least 4 drones impacted the village of Novomykolaivka, 3+ drones impacted the village of Dmytrivka, 2+ drones impacted the town of Vasylkivka, 2+ drones impacted Petrivka, 1+ drone impacted the village of Artemivka, and 1+ drone impacted the vicinity of Dobropillya.

Overnight, Ukrainian UAVs attacked the production facilities of the "Nevinnomyssky Azot" chemical plant in the city of Nevinnomyssk, Stavropol Krai.
Nevinnomyssky Azot specialises in the production of mineral fertilizers and products of organic synthesis. It recently underwent expansion in 2024 to produce potassium nitrate.
Coordinates: 44.65613, 41.94300

Overnight, Ukrainian UAVs attacked the production facilities of the "Nevinnomyssky Azot" chemical plant in the city of Nevinnomyssk, Stavropol Krai.
Nevinnomyssky Azot specialises in the production of mineral fertilizers and products of organic synthesis. It recently underwent expansion in 2024 to produce potassium nitrate.
Coordinates: 44.65613, 41.94300

Overnight, Ukrainian UAVs once again attacked the Oryol Combined Heat and Power Plant. A fire was seen burning at the plant's storage tanks. 
Coordinates: 52.991210, 36.09396

Last night, approximately 15 Russian Geran-2 drones attacked the "Crimean" 110 kV Electrical Substation in the northern suburbs of Odesa. A large fire broke out, resulting in power outages.   Coordinates: 46.586317 30.780000
Closer up image of the substation burning in Odesa.
A Ukrainian channel admits that Myrnohrad is encircled.
Very well-regarded Ukrainian military analyst and observer admits Myrnohrad is encircled (from November 30).

We also have this from JJ. 
But remember guys, the situation is stable and Myrnohrad isn't surrounded!

Earlier, two ‚ÄúVarshavyanka‚Äù submarines were deployed to the Black Sea from Novorossiysk Naval Base, Krasnodar Krai. One has since returned to Novorossiysk while the other remains in the area of cape Myshkako. 
Currently, there are ~35 Geran-2 drones detected in Ukrainian airspace, most of which entered in the last 10 minutes.

**Summary of Israeli aggression on Lebanese territory on 2025/12/4
- A hostile plane dropped a sonic bomb towards Adaisseh town
- A sonic bomb was dropped off the coast of Naqoura without causing casualties
- Intensive sweeping with machine guns from the Malkiya site towards the outskirts of Blida town
- An Israeli march bombed with two rockets the outskirts of Deirmimas and the surroundings of Al-Azziyah hill (no casualties)
- The enemy's artillery targeted the outskirts of Yaroun town
- Sweeping with machine guns from the Rweisat Al-Alam site towards the outskirts of Kfarchouba town
- The hostile warplane targeted a civilian house in Baraashit town (no casualties)
- The hostile warplane targeted a civilian house in Al-Majdal town (no casualties)
- The hostile warplane targeted a civilian house in Jbaa town (no casualties)
- The hostile warplane targeted a civilian house in Mahrouna town (no casualties)
- An Israeli plane dropped a bomb in the middle of Adaisseh town
- Enemy artillery shelling targeted the outskirts of Dhahira and Yarin towns (no casualties)
- Sweeping with machine guns from the enemy radar site towards the outskirts of Chebaa town
- Sweeping with machine guns from the enemy Malkiya site towards the outskirts of Aaytron town
- Flight and march of warplanes in Lebanese airspace

A Russian Gerbera reconnaissance drone is currently scouting out the Darnytsia Power Plant in Kyiv.

Russian forces have re-established control over the village of Nykanorivka, Dobropillya direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~469.
Total land area: ~1.38 km¬≤.
The second battle for Nykanorivka lasted approximately 3 months, 20 days.

The IDF claimed that its recent airstrikes on the city of Rafah, southern Gaza, killed the commander of Hamas' East Rafah Battalion Muhammad al-Bawab, along with his deputy commander, a regional company commander of the battalion, and a security guard from the battalion.
The East Rafah Battalion is one of four battalions which makes up Hamas' Rafah Brigade, operating in and around the Rafah Governorate in the southern Gaza Strip. 
The Rafah Brigade has been heavily degraded over the past two years and has lost most of its combat capabilities due to Israel's Rafah offensive. The IDF's continued operations in the southern part of the Gaza Strip have forced it to largely relocate its command structures to the neighbouring Khan Younis Governorate, with some cells still operating in Rafah due to the implementation of the ceasefire agreement.

Hamas' "Radea" security force announced that a local Palestinian clan killed Yasser Abu Shabab, the commander of the Israeli-backed "Popular Forces" militia, along with a number of other militants. 
The Popular Forces is a local Gazan militia made up of anti-Hamas Palestinians, and operates in eastern Rafah. It has cooperated with the IDF, carrying out security operations, in return for safety in its small pocket of territory containing its barracks (as indicated in the pink polygon on the map.

We are NOT about to turn into a low-IQ channel of people constantly insulting each other.

Last night, approximately 25 Russian Geran-2 drones attacked an unknown military-related target in the town of Turbiv, Vinnytsia Oblast. Whatever they were targeting only recently arrived in the town. A large fire is now burning at the impact site.

Military Situation In Ukraine On December 4, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On December 4, 2025 (Maps Update)

Russian Army Advances In Three Directions In Kharkiv And Donetsk (Videos)
On December 4, the Russian military advanced in three separate directions in both Kharkiv and Donetsk, mounting more pressure on Kiev forces.
In Kharkiv, the Zapad [West] Group of Forces stormed Bohuslavka, which is located right on the Oskil River. The northern part of the settlement has been captured, and battles are reported to be taking place now in the central part. Kiev forces seem unprepared to fight there, and thus, the settlement could get secured within a few days.
Russian troops resumed their advance in this direction only last week, and they have already made much progress which indicate that this may be just the start of a larger offensive.

Battles In Konstantynivka And Druzhkivka: Ukraine Faces New Russian Front Near Sloviansk
Russian units broke through the defenses of Konstantynivka from the southeast. Russian airborne units have taken control of about three-quarters of Prymorske's territory. 
The German magazine Der Spiegel published a transcript of a closed telephone conversation between EU leaders and Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

The Zelenska Project: How Evacuated Ukrainian Orphans Were Used for PR and Fundraising in Turkey
Ukrainian media, specifically the publication "Slidstvo.Info" in its investigation "State Children," reports on a large-scale scandal surrounding the program to evacuate orphaned children from the Dnipropetrovsk region to Turkey. The program was initiated in 2022 under the personal supervision of Ukraine's First Lady, Olena Zelenska.
According to journalists, as part of the "Childhood Without War" project implemented by businessman Ruslan Shostak's charitable foundation, 510 children were taken to Turkey, where they lived in hotels in Antalya and Beldibi for almost two years. The investigation revealed shocking details of systematic violations of children's rights, including exploitation, abuse, and criminal negligence by those responsible.
The evacuation operation, which Shostak called "the largest evacuation of children since World War II," involving the rental of nine planes...
